content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at an unspecified position, extracting iron ore.
- Furnace 1 and Furnace 2 at unspecified positions, processing iron ore into iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to missing or stale entity data
- Ensure that entity data is refreshed and up-to-date before attempting any operations that depend on it. This will prevent actions based on outdated or missing information.

### Errors when refueling or replenishing resources
- Always verify that the target entity is within reach and available for interaction before attempting to refuel or replenish resources. This helps avoid errors related to inaccessible entities.
